name: GCDualShockGamepad
desc: A controller profile that supports the DualShock 4 controller.

items.name: var touchpadButton: GCControllerButtonInput!
items.desc: The button element on the touchpad of the controller.

items.name: var touchpadPrimary: GCControllerDirectionPad!
items.desc: The location of the player’s primary finger on the touchpad.

items.name: var touchpadSecondary: GCControllerDirectionPad!
items.desc: The location of the player’s secondary finger on the touchpad.
